name: TRISHUL

address: 602 Gods Gift Tower, Yari Road, Versova

briefDescription: Trishul  Trishul is a charitable public trust registered under (Mumbai Public Trust Act 1860 and 1950), working towards building self-sustainable communities in slums, urban and economically backward rural villages. Trishul’s focus is in the areas of education for slum kids, women empowerment, environment, women entrepreneurship, disaster management, health and hygiene.1.1 VisionTo excel as an NGO facilitating self-sustainable communities in slums, urban and economically backward rural villages1.2 MissionTrishul supports and works with economically weaker sections of the society and its mission is to:–	Educate less-privileged children with the aim of imparting life skills.–	Facilitate livelihood generation for women from slums and rural villages.–	Help women artists by assisting them in generating business opportunities.–	Facilitate waste recycle and up-cycle.–	Inculcate healthy and hygienic habits among slum, urban and rural communities.–	Guide and empower youth.–	Create awareness on and prepare citizens for disaster management. –	Build self-sustainable communities (model village).
